title: Revengers Tragedy (Alex Cox) - 2002 DVDRip
description:
Revengers Tragedy (Alex Cox) - 2002 DVD5

From cult director Alex Cox (Repo Man; Sid and Nancy) comes this modernised adaptation of Thomas Middleton's celebrated play from 1607. It tells the story of a man whose wife is murdered on their wedding day and his desire to exact revenge on the murderer.

Director: Alex Cox 
Writers: Frank Cottrell Boyce (adaptation), Thomas Middleton (play) 
Stars: Christopher Eccleston, Kevin Knapman, Michael Ryan

================================

Video: MKV, anamorph 708x428@762x428, 25 fps, DivX Codec 6.8.5, ~1500 kbps avg, 0.20 bit/pixel

Audio 1: Russian, 192 Kbps, 48 Khz, 16 bits, 2 ch, AC3
Audio 2: English, 192 Kbps, 48 Khz, 16 bits, 2 ch, AC3

Subs: softsub (SRT), Rus + Eng
